main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in Marshall, Texas in 1952, with witnesses describing a bright, luminous green object moving at high speeds and exhibiting unusual flight patterns.
interesting points: The UFO was observed at an estimated altitude of around 10,000 feet, traveling at approximately 1,000 miles per hour or greater.
Witnesses reported the object as being egg-shaped in form, with white and green color and spots, growing to about 2 times the size of the moon.
The object was observed for a period of approximately 60 seconds before disappearing from view at a high point in the western sky.
A private pilot with 20 years of experience reported seeing the object, emphasizing the uniqueness of the sighting.
The object's apparent maneuvers included descending and ascending rapidly, and it did not leave a trail or make any sound.
sighted object: bright, luminous green object moving at high speeds
witnesses: individuals with varying backgrounds, including a private pilot
